name: Tailwind
0:
”Alexa ask Tailwind to open garage door 1”
”Alexa ask Tailwind to close all doors”
”Alexa ask Tailwind to check garage door 3”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tailwind
des:
Tailwind has developed 2 skills for Alexa. You can enable both skills. This is the custom skill. Enable this skill If you need to use Alexa to OPEN your garage door(s).


This skill works with the Tailwind garage door controller (www.gotailwind.com) Tailwind will internet enable up to 3 garage doors per device. With this skill and Tailwind, you can ask Alexa to check the status of your garage doors, or tell Alexa to open / close them. This skill is not a Smart Home Skill, but it does permit you to open your door with Alexa.

Try saying...

"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open garage door”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open garage"
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open garage door 1”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open garage door 2”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open garage door 3”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open door 1”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open door 2”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open door 3”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to open gate"

"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close all doors”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close garage door”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close garage"
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close garage door 1”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close garage door 2”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close garage door 3”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close door 1”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close door 2”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close door 3”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to close gate"

"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check garage door"
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check door"
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check garage"
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check all doors”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check all garage doors”
"Alexa, ask Tailwind to check gate"

For more information about Tailwind, please visit

www.gotailwind.com
